title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
1. Open the properties file for the chart.
2. Leave the 'key' field blank.
3. Save the properties file.
4. Open the chart and observe the title to see if the externalized text is displayed correctly.
